alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:01PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mobile and west central Baldwin Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 201 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Chunchula, or 5 miles west of Satsuma, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Saraland, Bay Minette, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, Chunchula, Axis, I65 And I165, I65 And AL 225 and I65 And AL 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
